author: thedevbirb
content:
Hi to everyone! I've a question regarding the `engine_forkchoiceUpdated` endpoint. 

By looking at Geth code I've seen that block building is triggered only when the payload attributes are provided, and uses only the head block hash from the FCS (reference: https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/blob/4cda8f06ea688cc3e523ee1e35425393ecad807c/eth/catalyst/api.go#L430-L438). 
Could block building be done in a separate endpoint like `engine_buildBlock` then?

author: m.kalinin
content: building a new block must happen only atop of the canonical chain. if forkchoiceUpdated and buildBlock were two separate calls then that atomicity would be hard to preserve
